TopicTitle: Orbital Sciences & Saftey ll Cygnus Alpha Release 0.1.1

Articles.Content:
Not really. I've been really busy with school and the likes. The Cygnus project will probably be postponed until Squad adds life support/I gain interest again. If I get some time I might make something. I have some ideas in floating in my head. I guess you guys can vote on the ones I'm interested in.

1. Nuclear expansion to the tech tree. Stuff like reactors and NERVAs, all the way to endgame stuff like Fusion engines for torchships.

2. Alderson points (Kind of useless without other star systems though)

3. Stock alike station parts. Stuff like radiators and lab modules.
